SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main application class that serves as the entry point for the Portfolio Management System.
Asset
An abstract base class representing a financial asset with common properties and behaviors.
AssetFactory
A factory class for creating different types of assets.
AuthService
The AuthService class provides authentication services including user registration and login.
AuthService.LoginResult
Represents the result of a login attempt, which may contain the authenticated user.
AuthService.SignupResult
Enum representing possible outcomes of a user registration attempt.
AuthUI
A console-based user interface for the authentication system.
Crypto
Represents a cryptocurrency asset, extending the base Asset class.
Database<T>
An abstract database class that provides basic file-based CRUD operations for serializable objects.
Gold
Represents a gold asset in the investment portfolio.
Investor
Represents an Investor user in the system, extending the base User class.
PerformancCalculator
 
Portfolio
Represents an investment portfolio containing various assets.
PortfolioDatabase
A database implementation for managing Portfolio objects.
PortfolioManager
Manages portfolio operations for an investor, including creating, viewing, editing, and removing portfolios and their assets.
PortfolioReport
Generates a detailed report of an investor's portfolios, including asset information and zakat applicability.
RealState
Represents a real estate asset in the investment portfolio.
ReportGenerator
An abstract base class for generating various types of reports.
RiskAllocation
 
Stocks
Represents a stock asset in the investment portfolio.
TestUserDatabase
Test class for verifying user authentication functionality.
User
An abstract base class representing a User in the system.
UserDatabase
The UserDatabase class manages persistence and operations for User objects.
ZakatEstimator
A utility class for calculating and displaying Zakat obligations on investment portfolios according to Islamic financial principles.
ZakatReport
A report generator that creates detailed Zakat calculation reports for investment portfolios.
